# Generics Docs

## Generic types

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/generics/index.md): Learn about generics in .NET. Define & use generics, learn their advantages & drawbacks, understand class library & language support, and more.
- [Generic collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/generics/collections.md): Learn more about: Generic collections in .NET
- [Generic delegates for manipulating arrays and lists](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/generics/delegates-for-manipulating-arrays-and-lists.md): Learn more about: Generic Delegates for Manipulating Arrays and Lists
- [Generic math](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/generics/math.md): Learn more about interfaces for generic math in .NET.
- [Generic interfaces](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/generics/interfaces.md): Learn more about interfaces for generic types in .NET.
- [Covariance and contravariance](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/generics/covariance-and-contravariance.md): Learn about covariance, which allows you to use a more derived type, and contravariance, which allows you to use a less derived type, in .NET generics.
